comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of mechanical keyboards and y be the number of standard keyboards, both integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "5x - 2y \leq 0",
        "2x - y \leq 0",
        "y \geq 30",
        "5x + 2y \leq 1000",
        "2x + y \leq 250",
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize Z = x + y"
}
